atmos.rain_frzgr.long_name: Number of rain on frozen ground days
atmos.rain_frzgr.description: {freq} number of days with rain above {thresh} after a series of seven days with average daily temperature below 0℃. Precipitation is assumed to be rain when thedaily average temperature is above 0℃.

atmos.wetdays.description: {freq} number of days with daily precipitation over {thresh}.

atmos.cdd.description: {freq} maximum number of days with daily precipitation below {thresh}.

atmos.cwd.description: {freq} maximum number of days with daily precipitation over {thresh}.

atmos.sdii.description: {freq} Simple Daily Intensity Index (SDII) : {freq} average precipitation for days with daily precipitation over {thresh}.

atmos.liquidprcptot.description: {freq} total liquid precipitation, estimated as precipitation when daily average temperature >= 0°C

atmos.solidprcptot.description: {freq} total solid precipitation, estimated as precipitation when daily average temperature < 0°C

atmos.DC.description: Numeric rating of the average moisture content of organic layers. Computed with start up method {start_up_mode}

atmos.tn_days_below.description: {freq} number of days where daily minimum temperature is below {thresh}

atmos.tx_days_above.description: {freq} number of days where daily maximum temperature exceeds {thresh}

atmos.tx_tn_days_above.long_name: Number of days with Tmax > {thresh_tasmax} and Tmin > {thresh_tasmin}
atmos.tx_tn_days_above.description: {freq} number of days where daily maximum temperature exceeds {thresh_tasmax} and minimum temperature exceeds {thresh_tasmin}

atmos.heat_wave_frequency.long_name: Number of heat wave events (Tmin > {thresh_tasmin}and Tmax > {thresh_tasmax} for >= {window} days)
atmos.heat_wave_frequency.description: {freq} number of heat wave events over a given period. An event occurs when the minimum and maximum daily temperature both exceeds specific thresholds : (Tmin > {thresh_tasmin} and Tmax > {thresh_tasmax}) over a minimum number of days ({window}).

atmos.heat_wave_max_length.long_name: Maximum length of heat wave events (Tmin > {thresh_tasmin}and Tmax > {thresh_tasmax} for >= {window} days)
atmos.heat_wave_max_length.description: {freq} maximum length of heat wave events occuring in a given period.An event occurs when the minimum and maximum daily temperature both exceeds specific thresholds (Tmin > {thresh_tasmin} and Tmax > {thresh_tasmax}) over a minimum number of days ({window}).

atmos.heat_wave_index.long_name: Number of days that are part of a heatwave
atmos.heat_wave_index.description: {freq} number of days that are part of a heatwave, defined as five or more consecutive days over {thresh}.

atmos.tg.description: Estimated mean temperature from maximum and minimum temperatures

atmos.tg10p.long_name: Number of days when Tmean < 10th percentile
atmos.tg10p.description: {freq} number of days with mean daily temperature below the 10th percentile.The 10th percentile is to be computed for a 5 day window centered on each calendar day for a reference period.

atmos.tg90p.long_name: Number of days when Tmean > 90th percentile
atmos.tg90p.description: {freq} number of days with mean daily temperature above the 90th percentile.The 90th percentile is to be computed for a 5 day window centered on each calendar day for a reference period.

atmos.tn10p.long_name: Number of days when Tmin < 10th percentile
atmos.tn10p.description: {freq} number of days with minimum daily temperature below the 10th percentile.The 10th percentile is to be computed for a 5 day window centered on each calendar day for a reference period.

atmos.tn90p.long_name: Number of days when Tmin > 90th percentile
atmos.tn90p.description: {freq} number of days with minimum daily temperature above the 90th percentile.The 90th percentile is to be computed for a 5 day window centered on each calendar day for a reference period.

atmos.tx10p.long_name: Number of days when Tmax < 10th percentile
atmos.tx10p.description: {freq} number of days with maximum daily temperature below the 10th percentile.The 10th percentile is to be computed for a 5 day window centered on each calendar day for a reference period.

atmos.tx90p.long_name: Number of days when Tmax > 90th percentile
atmos.tx90p.description: {freq} number of days with maximum daily temperature above the 90th percentile.The 90th percentile is to be computed for a 5 day window centered on each calendar day for a reference period.

atmos.dtrvar.description: {freq} mean diurnal temparature range variability (defined as the average day-to-day variation in daily temperature range for the given time period)

atmos.etr.description: {freq} range between the maximum of daily max temperature (tx_max) and the minimum of daily min temperature (tn_min)

atmos.cold_spell_duration_index.long_name: Cold Spell Duration Index, count of days with at least {window} consecutive days when Tmin < 10th percentile
atmos.cold_spell_duration_index.description: {freq} number of days with at least {window} consecutive days where the daily minimum temperature is below the 10th percentile. The 10th percentile should be computed for a 5-day window centred on each calendar day in the  1961-1990 period

atmos.cold_spell_days.description: {freq} number of days that are part of a cold spell, defined as {window} or more consecutive days with mean daily temperature below  {thresh}.

atmos.dlyfrzthw.description: {freq} number of days with a diurnal freeze-thaw cycle : Tmax > {thresh_tasmax} and Tmin <= {thresh_tasmin}.

atmos.freshet_start.long_name: Day of year of spring freshet start
atmos.freshet_start.description: Day of year of spring freshet start, defined as the first day a temperature threshold of {thresh} is exceeded for at least {window} days.

atmos.frost_days.description: {freq} number of days with minimum daily temperature below 0℃.

atmos.ice_days.description: {freq} number of days with maximum daily temperature below 0℃

atmos.consecutive_frost_days.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive days with Tmin < 0C
atmos.consecutive_frost_days.description: {freq} maximum number of consecutive days with minimum daily temperature below 0℃

atmos.growing_season_length.description: {freq} number of days between the first occurrence of at least six consecutive days with mean daily temperature over {thresh} and the first occurrence of at least {window} consecutive days with mean daily temperature below {thresh} after {mid_date}.

atmos.tropical_nights.description: {freq} number of Tropical Nights : defined as days with minimum daily temperature above {thresh}

land.base_flow_index.description: Minimum 7-day average flow divided by the mean flow.

land.freq_analysis.description: Streamflow frequency analysis for the {mode} {indexer} {window}-day flow estimated using the {dist} distribution.

land.doy_qmax.long_name: Day of the year of the maximum over {indexer}
land.doy_qmax.description: Day of the year of the maximum over {indexer}

land.doy_qmin.long_name: Day of the year of the minimum over {indexer}
land.doy_qmin.description: Day of the year of the minimum over {indexer}

seaIce.sea_ice_area.description: The sum of ice-covered areas where sea ice concentration is at least {thresh}.

seaIce.sea_ice_extent.description: The sum of ocean areas where sea ice concentration is at least {thresh}.
